item.title: NASCAR 25（新規追加）
item.description: iRacing is proud to present NASCAR 25, the official game of NASCAR featuring ALL FOUR National Series, the ARCA Menards Series, NASCAR Xfinity Series, NASCAR Craftsman Truck Series, and NASCAR Cup Series.

item.title: Entities Declassified: Winter Hungers（新規追加）
item.description: An amateur TV crew disappeared during a 1997 shoot in Ontario’s deep woods. Step into that frostbitten night in the chilling first case in Entities Declassified, untangle their fate, and learn what silenced the crew.
item.content:encoded:
An amateur TV crew disappeared during a 1997 shoot in Ontario’s deep woods. Step into that frostbitten night in the chilling first case in Entities Declassified, untangle their fate, and learn what silenced the crew.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Cats Visiting El Dorado（新規追加）
item.description: Feline explorers have overrun the lost city! Find 400 cleverly hidden cats across 5 lush scenes of ancient jungle ruins. A relaxing yet challenging hidden object adventure.
item.content:encoded:
Feline explorers have overrun the lost city! Find 400 cleverly hidden cats across 5 lush scenes of ancient jungle ruins. A relaxing yet challenging hidden object adventure.

item.title: Tower of Wizard（新規追加）
item.description: Tower of Wizard is a survival rogue-lite where you ascend a cursed tower filled with monstrous foes and fallen wizards. Collect powerful relics, craft broken builds, and uncover the mystery that waits at the top floor.
item.content:encoded:
Tower of Wizard is a survival rogue-lite where you ascend a cursed tower filled with monstrous foes and fallen wizards. Collect powerful relics, craft broken builds, and uncover the mystery that waits at the top floor.

item.title: Cats Visiting Wild West（新規追加）
item.description: Explore charming Wild West scenes and find hidden cats hiding in saloons, canyons, and steam trains. Relax, search, and collect them all!
item.content:encoded:
Explore charming Wild West scenes and find hidden cats hiding in saloons, canyons, and steam trains. Relax, search, and collect them all!

Steamでページを開く

item.title: KIETA MEMORY – The Girl from the Stars（新規追加）
item.description: A romantic sci-fi visual novel starting in 1992. Life with your girlfriend Azuki, the girl from the stars, is fun, but when cosmic conspiracies threaten your love and all of Earth, you and your friends have to embark on an epic journey through time and space and rewrite your future.
item.content:encoded:
A romantic sci-fi visual novel starting in 1992. Life with your girlfriend Azuki, the girl from the stars, is fun, but when cosmic conspiracies threaten your love and all of Earth, you and your friends have to embark on an epic journey through time and space and rewrite your future.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Cosmic Corps（新規追加）
item.description: Cosmic Corps is an action roguelike with bullet hell elements. Blast, slash, and laser hostile lifeforms as you dimension hop to freedom across a series of planets. Loot everything you can to arm yourself against the entity lurking deep within the Rift.
item.content:encoded:
Cosmic Corps is an action roguelike with bullet hell elements. Blast, slash, and laser hostile lifeforms as you dimension hop to freedom across a series of planets. Loot everything you can to arm yourself against the entity lurking deep within the Rift.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Summer Reunion（新規追加）
item.description: A visual novel with more than 50 illustrations to color the story. Summer" has suddenly disappeared from a certain town. A boy returns to the town where the seasons have stopped, and is reunited with his former friends. What awaits him after he overcomes the cost of his wish?
item.content:encoded:
A visual novel with more than 50 illustrations to color the story. Summer" has suddenly disappeared from a certain town. A boy returns to the town where the seasons have stopped, and is reunited with his former friends. What awaits him after he overcomes the cost of his wish?

Steamでページを開く

item.title: RogueStacks（新規追加）
item.description: A resource-gathering Tower Defense and Roguelike with card-based gameplay set in medieval times. Collect coins to upgrade your villagers and unlock new cards.
item.content:encoded:
A resource-gathering Tower Defense and Roguelike with card-based gameplay set in medieval times. Collect coins to upgrade your villagers and unlock new cards.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: 终焉与珑同行（新規追加）
item.description: "Alongside the End" is a visual novel about quiet days. No magic, no twists—just two people spending time together. They eat, talk, argue, and laugh. Nothing really happens, yet something stays—a glance, a word, a memory. It doesn’t try to impress. It only asks: stay a little longer. Just once more.
item.content:encoded:
"Alongside the End" is a visual novel about quiet days. No magic, no twists—just two people spending time together. They eat, talk, argue, and laugh. Nothing really happens, yet something stays—a glance, a word, a memory. It doesn’t try to impress. It only asks: stay a little longer. Just once more.

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Twin Palms（新規追加）
item.description: At Twin Palms your shift is over, but the office won’t let you leave. In this First-Person Psychological Horror Game: carefully observe a looping environment, spot differences, overcome Trial Anomalies, and snoop around the office. You can clock out, but can you really escape?
item.content:encoded:

item.title: TEKNOKRAT（新規追加）
item.description: Enter the city of Nu-Vika as a cyborg repairman in TEKNOKRAT, a thriller romance visual novel. There's a conspiracy brewing beneath this techno-metropolis, and you find yourself an unwilling participant. You will meet three clients, cyborgs with secrets and aspirations of their own.
item.content:encoded:
Enter the city of Nu-Vika as a cyborg repairman in TEKNOKRAT, a thriller romance visual novel. There's a conspiracy brewing beneath this techno-metropolis, and you find yourself an unwilling participant. You will meet three clients, cyborgs with secrets and aspirations of their own.

item.title: AWSS（新規追加）
item.description: Immerse yourself in a first-person shooter where Low-poly cartoonish visuals clash with a sinister, gloomy atmosphere. Armed with a massive arsenal of weapons, you’ll blast through hordes of Enemies, infiltrate a sinister lab, and fight your way to the escape point.

item.description: Use your magical app to support yandere goth girls... Selene, Ruby, and Raven. Get closer to each of them. Explore their lives, fund their goals, and shape each relationship through your decisions. Choose well and they’ll open up about their true desires and maybe even show you.

item.title: ANTHEM OF LIMBO（新規追加）
item.description: Journey across reality and track down the ANTHEM! ANTHEM OF LIMBO is an unforgiving snake-like bullet-hell where you choose the order in which you face each of 8 supernatural bosses. Unlock powers and abilities! Fight against the odds and be the first to find the ANTHEM!

item.description: a vehicular shadow of the colossus boss rush. pilot a hovercraft against increasing otherworldly colossal entities in a desolate future. weave through their attacks, study their timing and land the killing blow. fulfill your delusions of grandeur in this sandy world. there is no hope for you here.
item.content:encoded:
a vehicular shadow of the colossus boss rush. pilot a hovercraft against increasing otherworldly colossal entities in a desolate future. weave through their attacks, study their timing and land the killing blow. fulfill your delusions of grandeur in this sandy world. there is no hope for you here.

item.title: 阿波罗奏鸣曲 - Apollo Sonata（新規追加）
item.description: 传说中，夜晚的校园充满了怪谈和诅咒：血水厕所、乱码黑板、空中的冥府之路，以及天台上自动弹奏的钢琴。游戏三个周目中，你将分别扮演缪、杜松子和沫沫三位学生，在夜晚的校园探索灵异背后的真相。在笑与泪的探险中，少女们的友情能否成为解开的钥匙？
item.content:encoded:
传说中，夜晚的校园充满了怪谈和诅咒：血水厕所、乱码黑板、空中的冥府之路，以及天台上自动弹奏的钢琴。游戏三个周目中，你将分别扮演缪、杜松子和沫沫三位学生，在夜晚的校园探索灵异背后的真相。在笑与泪的探险中，少女们的友情能否成为解开的钥匙？

Steamでページを開く

item.title: Descendant（新規追加）
item.description: Descendant is a love letter to the 00s era of survival horror. Play as Blake Cage, a sharp-tongued operative of Vector Six - humanity’s last hope against the darkness. Unravel a gripping, lore-rich mystery of ancient immortals, bloodthirsty vampires, and the desperate struggle of mankind.
item.content:encoded:
Descendant is a love letter to the 00s era of survival horror. Play as Blake Cage, a sharp-tongued operative of Vector Six - humanity’s last hope against the darkness. Unravel a gripping, lore-rich mystery of ancient immortals, bloodthirsty vampires, and the desperate struggle of mankind.

Steamでページを開く

item.description: A side scrolling side-on shooter from the depths of a long-lost arcade cabinet where you take the role of a UFO on the hunt for human prey! Capture them alive with your tractor beam and pull them into your saucer while unleashing your heat ray upon tanks, planes, and all manner of military might!

item.description: In the vast Starry Universe, stars collide with the power of shadows, giving birth to four heroic professions: warrior, mage, priestess, and archer. Players transform into "Star Luo Commander" and fight against evil forces on the epic battlefield of 100vs100, rewriting the fate of the universe.

item.title: Grand Elder‌ Teaches You Immortal Cultivation（新規追加）
item.description: A cultivation style rougelike game that automatically releases skills, controls characters using WASD, refines qi(Chinese magic energy) to gain experience (body touches monsters), and annihilates qi to obtain spiristone, a type of coin(sword touches monsters).

item.title: Fallfate: Impulsive Plinko（新規追加）
item.description: Fallfate is short, action-packed roguelike plinko. Discs’ paths are deterministic; defy them with spin. Parry enemies and shift risks into advantages. Gamble through chaotic worlds and face towering bosses. Die and refine with each fall, until you master the true nature of fate.
item.content:encoded:
Fallfate is short, action-packed roguelike plinko. Discs’ paths are deterministic; defy them with spin. Parry enemies and shift risks into advantages. Gamble through chaotic worlds and face towering bosses. Die and refine with each fall, until you master the true nature of fate.

item.title: Ginga Cantina（新規追加）
item.description: Ginga Cantina is a casual sci-fi adventure RPG that blends top-down hunting and gathering with cantina management. Hunt exotic creatures on a vibrant alien planet by day, then cook and serve them to a quirky cast of cosmic customers by night to build the galaxy's most renowned cantina.
item.content:encoded:
Ginga Cantina is a casual sci-fi adventure RPG that blends top-down hunting and gathering with cantina management. Hunt exotic creatures on a vibrant alien planet by day, then cook and serve them to a quirky cast of cosmic customers by night to build the galaxy's most renowned cantina.

item.title: Wrong Number - Just 69cm Between Us (ebook)（新規追加）
